name: BULLET TIED
description:
BULLET TIED, A GAME WHERE YOUR BULLETS, AND ENEMIES BULLETS TAKE THEIR TIME .

- - -

CONTROLS 

WASD [MOVEMENT] + SPACE [DASH]

KILL ALL ENEMIES TO FINISH THE GAME

THE GAME WILL STOP THE CLOCK WHEN YOU'RE DONE

---

i put zero effort into this game, thanks for playing though, im so happy if you enjoyed it :)
